channel.title: ARIMA on Orion Illovsky's Data Analysis Projects

item.title: Forecasting Healthcare Revenue with ARIMA Time Series Modeling
item.description: Forecasting Healthcare Revenue with ARIMA Time Series Modeling Description This project aimed to develop a reliable forecasting model to predict monthly revenue for a healthcare organization. Leveraging the SARIMAX model (a more general form of ARIMA) in Python, I analyzed two years of historical daily revenue data.
